us.name: TV-Y
us.description: All Children. This program is designed to be appropriate for all children.

us.name: TV-Y7
us.description: Directed to Older Children. This program is designed for children age 7 and above.

us.name: TV-G
us.description: General Audience. Most parents would find this program suitable for all ages.

us.name: TV-PG
us.description: Parental Guidance Suggested. This program contains material that parents may find unsuitable for younger children.

us.name: TV-14
us.description: Parents Strongly Cautioned. This program contains some material that many parents would find unsuitable for children under 14 years of age.

us.name: TV-MA
us.description: Mature Audience Only. This program is specifically designed to be viewed by adults and therefore may be unsuitable for children under 17.
